content: this is a nod to the showtime crochet hat by the crochet crowd adjusted to be a headband instead please check out that pattern at this link click me crochet crowd offers lots of little tutorials on how to do the drop and the camel stitch involved in this pattern hook size 4 0mm if your crochet gauge is very tight i would recommend going up to a 4 5mm hook to ensure there is elasticity to the piece no one wants a headband squeezing too tight finished dimensions - height 5-6in - width 8-10in recommended yarn - dk or worsted - lion brand mandala ombre - polymorph dye works dk all day amount of yarn required in g 76g notes - fldtc front loop only drop triple crochet -> triple crochet in the front loop 3 row down - camel stitch -> when half_double_crochet in the round create stitch in the 3rd back loop so the arrow of the stitch shows to the front of the work - single_crochet single_crochet - half_double_crochet half_double_crochet - tc triple crochet - sts stitches - blo back loop only bl back loop - flo front loop only fl front loop pattern to begin - chain 81 - join in the round and half_double_crochet in the back loop all the way around 81 sts - continue in a round as a spiral - work camel stitch for rounds 2-6 81sts center drops - single_crochet in the 3rd loop to finish the camel stitch round before it 81st - single_crochet blo for 2 more row 8-9 81sts - 1 back loop only single_crochet in each of the next 4 sts complete one fldtc repeat until end of round 81sts --> the pattern to follow here is to complete 4 single_crochet sts and 1 dtc repeatedly until 10 fl drop stitches are in the same twist section each twist should end up one before the previous row - once you have 10 triple crochet s in each diagonal you ve completed the center of the headband you ve now completed 19 row/rounds initial chain 6hdc camel sts 3sc 10 fldtc 81sts decreases - half_double_crochet all the way around to begin the camel stitch finish - half_double_crochet camel stitch decrease 4 sts evenly over the next round 77sts - half_double_crochet camel stitch decrease 4 sts evenly over the next round 73sts - half_double_crochet camel stitch decrease 2 sts evenly over the next round 71sts - half_double_crochet camel stitch decrease 3 sts evenly over the next round 68sts - single_crochet in the third loop to finish the 5th camel stitch row 68sts - weave in your ends and you re done thanks for making emma neubert https //thecrochetcrowd com/show-time-crochet-adult-hats/ if the link doesn t work on the first page here is the written out link for you to check out the inspiration
